scripts.gitpod-prepare: (yes | sudo apt install screen); (yes | sudo apt install rsync); screen -S docker -d -m sudo docker-up
scripts.local-hasura: (cd packages/hasura; screen -S hasura -d -m npm run local)
scripts.local-store-example: (cd packages/store-example; screen -S store-example -d -m npm run local)
scripts.local-hasura-example: (cd packages/hasura-example; screen -S hasura-example -d -m npm run local; sleep 20; npm run local-unmigrate && npm run local-migrate)
scripts.local-materialized-path: (cd packages/materialized-path; npm run local-unmigrate && npm run local-migrate && npm run local-test)
scripts.local: npm ci; (npm run packages; sleep 3; npm run local-hasura; sleep 10; npm run local-materialized-path; npm run local-store-example; sleep 10; npm run local-hasura-example;)
scripts.gitpod-hasura: (cd packages/hasura; screen -S hasura -d -m npm run gitpod)
scripts.gitpod-store-example: (cd packages/store-example; screen -S store-example -d -m npm run gitpod)
scripts.gitpod-hasura-example: (cd packages/hasura-example; screen -S hasura-example -d -m npm run gitpod; sleep 20; npm run gitpod-unmigrate && npm run gitpod-migrate)
scripts.gitpod-materialized-path: (cd packages/materialized-path; npm run gitpod-unmigrate && npm run gitpod-migrate && npm run gitpod-test)
scripts.gitpod: npm run gitpod-prepare && npm ci; (npm run packages; sleep 3; npm run gitpod-hasura; sleep 10; npm run gitpod-materialized-path; npm run gitpod-store-example; sleep 10; npm run gitpod-hasura-example;)
